GET A QUOTE

# Hire Cleveland Bartenders

### You're Busy Planning A Party... Let Us Handle The Bar!

GET A QUOTE NOW

## (440) 534-2500

Sit Back, Relax And Be A Guest At Your Own Party!

Since 2006, With A Twist has led the industry in Bartending and Event
Services. We provide expert bartenders and bar service for parties of any
size. The staff is fully trained, certified and covered by both liquor and
general liability insurance. We handle everything needed for full bar service
including specialty drink design, alcohol ordering or support, and provide all
equipment needed for your full bar to include supplies such as: a portable
bar, ice, soda, mixers, garnish, cups, napkins, and of course talented and
experienced staff.

PACKAGES

GET A QUOTE

Play Video

###  WEDDINGS

Receptions Rehearsals

Congratulations! It’s your big day. With A Twist Cleveland Bartending Service
takes pride in making your wedding the memory you have always dreamed about.
Let us provide your guests with an experience they will be talking about for
years to come. We are honored to share this life experience with you, your
family and friends.

###  PARTIES

Private & Corporate

Celebrate That Big Win, Thank Your Team Or Client, Or Just Throw A Party! Who
doesn’t love a good party? Allow With A Twist Cleveland Bartending Service the
privilege of showing your guests an experience that will exceed their
expectations. We are here to serve!

###  EVENTS

Non-Profit & Festivals & More

No matter if you're hosting a Non-Profit Event or a large scale Festival,
Concert or Sporting Event, With a Twist has the professional bartenders to
help your next event be a hit with your guests.

###  CUSTOM

Personalized Solutions

Are you in need of a Bartender for a Unique Event? We handle all sorts of
events such as Product Launches and Business Acquisitions, Halloween and
Holiday Parties, Trade Shows and Expo's, and even Conventions and Outdoor
Events. Contact us today to discuss your Custom Needs!

## Cleveland Bartender Packages

Play Video

## complete bar package

###  "Most Popular"

**With A Twist Bartending Service Most Popular and Inclusive Bartending
Package that will exceed your expectations. Our Bartenders will bring
everything needed for Complete Beverage Service at your event. This package is
perfect for those who want a hassle-free service for all of your Bar &
Beverage Needs.**

Package Includes

This Package Includes: The Bartenders, Liquor Liability Insurance, Portable
Bar With Linens, Coolers, Disposable Cups, Straws, Beverage Napkins, Water,
Mixers, Juice, Soda, Garnish and Ice…Lots Of Ice!

GET QUOTE

Play Video

## just the bartender

###  You Provide All The Supplies

**With A Twist Bartending Service provides this great option if you have
nearly everything you need for your party. Our professional, liquor liability
insured bartenders will show up with the essential tools and use whatever you
have on hand. Order 1 or 100 bartenders, we’ve got you covered. Contact us
today**

Package Includes

This Package Includes: Bartender, shaker, wine key, bottle opener, spill mat,
ice bucket and serving bins.

GET QUOTE

Alcohol Ordering & Delivery

With A Twist can help you with your alcohol order and determine the quantities
and brands you need for your event. Let us do all the work by having us
deliver and return all of your alcohol through our suppliers. Contact us about
your alcohol order today!

  * Great pricing
  * Returns on all unused products, where available
  * Delivery to your event location
  * Consulting on amounts and best products for your event

Additional Services

**With A Twist Bartending Service also provides:**

  * **Non-Alcoholic Beverage Stations**  featuring your favorite drinks such as Iced Tea, Peach Infused Water, Lemonade, Cucumber Water, Watermelon Mint Water and Many Others.
  * **Environmentally safe disposable options**
  * **$1,000,000 Liquor Liability Insurance**
  * **Friendly, Professional Bar Staff!**

GET QUOTE

We will assist you in determining exactly how much alcohol is needed at your
party. Don’t get caught in the trap of paying for “all you can drink plans”
others offer.

### Cleveland Bartending Services

## F.A.Qs

Are you planning a wedding? Maybe a family reunion or even a holiday party? We
have you covered. With A Twist Bartending Service provides you with the best
bartenders.

### Bartending

Insured

With A Twist Bartending Service is fully insured which makes all the
difference in the unlikely event something goes wrong. You get to enjoy the
party and not worry about a thing.

Award Winning

With A Twist Bartenders are the best of the best. They are awarded top honors
in the industry for their mixology skills and customer service. They will
entertain your guests and take your party to the next level.

Professional

The With A Twist Bartending team prides themselves on providing you the
highest level of service. Our hand picked bartenders will arrive at your event
with all the equipment, mixers, garnish and beverages, professionally dressed
and ready to serve you and your guests.

Top Talent

All With A Twist Bartenders are highly trained professionals that are TIPS
certified and experienced

### Services

Wedding Bartenders

Congratulations! It’s your big day. With A Twist Bartending Service takes
pride in making your wedding the memory you have always dreamed about. Let us
provide your guests with an experience they will be talking about for years to
come. We are honored to share this life experience with you, your family and
friends.

Event Bartenders

Celebrate That Big Win, Thank Your Team Or Client, Or Just Throw A Party! Who
doesn’t love a good party? Allow With A Twist Bartending Service the privilege
of showing your guests an experience that meets the excellence and culture of
your company. We are here to serve!

Party Bartenders

If you’re planning a party for any reason, With A Twist Bartending Service
promises to make it special. We get the party started with a fun and
experienced team. Let us do all the work so you can sit back and enjoy. Your
guests will thank you for a “Good Time”!

Bartending Service

When you’re searching on Google for “ **bartenders near me** _“, you found the
best bartenders for your next event. Our local bartending services are
specialized to serve your guests at an affordable cost and with the highest
professionalism._

### Questions

Do You Offer Alcohol Discounts?

With A Twist Bartending Service has prearranged relationships with liquor
retailers who provide great pricing for our customers. We handle how much you
need, ordering the products, delivery and allow you to return anything you
don’t use.

How Much Does It Cost?

With A Twist Bartending Service offers the most competitive price in the
industry. Whether you need to Hire A Bartender by the hour, or have us provide
a Complete Bar Package, we are here to help.

Location & Service Areas?

As the national leader in bartending services & staffing, we have locations
all across the USA and have some of the highest voted and best bartenders in
Ohio including:

Cincinnati, OH

Columbus, OH

Cleveland, OH

Elyria, OH



We can serve parties of any size & in any location.

  * Private Residence
  * Event Center Or Venue
  * Park or Public Space

How To Hire A Bartender?

When you’re ready to hire a bartender for your wedding, party, event, or even
just for tonight, contact us as soon as you can to get pricing and
availability.
